mapper.insert: insert into sm_reserve (commodity_id, reserve_amount, reserve_at, employee_id) value (#{commodityId}, #{reserveAmount}, #{reserveAt}, #{employeeId})
mapper.select: select a.commodity_id, a.reserve_at, a.employee_id, a.reserve_amount, b.commodity_name, c.employee_name from sm_reserve a, sm_commodity b, sm_employees c where a.employee_id = c.employee_id and a.commodity_id = b.commodity_id
